articles.title: Fires rage across southern Europe, forcing hundreds to evacuate - CNA
articles.description: Dozens of villages were evacuated in tourist hotspots in southern Turkey on Sunday as wildfires that have claimed eight lives raged for a fifth day, while blazes also hit Greece, Italy and Spain.
